item.description:
Woo Hoo!

Kicking off my weekend back in my home town of Boston will be this fun after work networking event. We have another event planned for Sunday afternoon. (Please see the calendar for details) Be sure to bring business cards!

I'm looking forward to meeting you all!

Please note that regular drink prices will be anywhere from $8-$12 dollars.

ADMISSION:
$10 at the door
NOTE: Admission is the same regardless of what time you arrive.

ADMISSION INCLUDES:
*Food for 20-30 people has been ordered!
*Spinache & Artichoke Dip
*Chicken Satay
*Spring Rolls
*Venue required us to order food in order to reserve a private space for our group



AGE RANGE:
The age range of attendees will vary. The approximate age range of men and women based on past similar events is:
MEN - 25-45
WOMEN - 25-45

IMPORTANT!!!!!!
RSVP is REQUIRED for this event for both men and women. No exceptions. We have a lot of men showing up at the door without RSVPing. In order for us to work to ensure an even gender ratio, we need to have an accurate idea of men and women attending.

DRESS CODE
Absolutely NO JEANS, NO SNEAKERS, NO ACTIVE WEAR.

THINGS TO KNOW:
*This event is open to all!
*Dress code is upscale trendy - Please try to dress to impress - ABSOLUTELY NO JEANS/SNEAKERS
*Ethnically diverse crowd of professionals
*We'll be there from 7-9pm
*Please try to arrive between 7:00 and 7:30pm
*Other than the drink specials, other cocktails will range from $8-$12

ADMISSION:
$10 at the door
NOTE: Admission is the same regardless of what time you arrive.

TIPS TO HAVE A GREAT TIME:
*Please adhere to the dress code.
*Large scale events like this are best for people who are outgoing and enjoy mingling. If you're not comfortable in large crowds, then this might not be the best event for you.
*Arrive between 7:00 & 7:30pm. Please do not arrive at the venue earlier than 7:00pm.
*Please DO NOT bring large bags, knapsacks or other large items to this event.






CO-SPONSORED BY:
Boston Social Networking
The Boston Social/Professional Networking Meetup Group

group.name: The Boston Social/Singles Networking Meetup Group

item.name: Networking Happy Hour at The Living Room!
